Key Match Events: Ben Stokes hit the winning run as England sealed victory by five wickets
Sam Curran took four overs with three wickets and just 12 runs
Adil Rashid took two wickets and conceded 22 runs, including a wicket maiden
Shaheen Afridi took a catch but injured himself and had to leave the field
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler hailed the team's heroics
England became the first men's team to hold the T20 and ODI World Cups simultaneously
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alex Hales, Phil Salt, and Jos Buttler were all dismissed in the powerplay
Naseem Shah bowled a remarkable spell of fast bowling
The match remained finely balanced until Harry Brook's dismissal
Ben Stokes ended unbeaten on 52, and Moeen Ali 19 off 12
